asset.name: efgartigimod
asset.modality: Fc fragment (human IgG1 Fc engineered for enhanced FcRn binding)

biology.function: FcRn is responsible for recycling IgG antibodies, extending their half-life. Blocking FcRn leads to accelerated degradation of IgG, including pathogenic autoantibodies
biology.mechanism: Efgartigimod binds FcRn with high affinity, blocking the IgG recycling pathway and causing rapid reduction in total IgG and pathogenic autoantibodies
biology.igg_reduction: Approximately 60-80% reduction in total IgG levels
biology.selectivity: Fc fragment design provides targeted FcRn engagement

genetic_validation.rationale: FcRn biology validated by success of IVIg and plasmapheresis in autoimmune diseases; genetic evidence from FcRn polymorphisms
genetic_validation.therapeutic_precedent: First-in-class FcRn inhibitor; now multiple FcRn competitors in development/approved

rationale: IgG autoantibodies drive pathology in many autoimmune diseases
FcRn inhibition provides rapid, reversible IgG reduction
Mechanism-agnostic approach works across different autoantibody specificities
Validated by clinical success in MG, CIDP, and multiple Phase 2/3 programs
why_good_target.broad_applicability: 15+ potential indications across neurology, rheumatology, dermatology, and other autoimmune diseases

mechanism.description: Efgartigimod is an engineered human IgG1 Fc fragment with mutations that increase affinity for FcRn. By blocking FcRn-mediated IgG recycling, efgartigimod accelerates IgG catabolism, leading to rapid reduction in pathogenic autoantibodies
key_features: Does not deplete B cells or affect other immunoglobulins (IgA, IgM, IgE)

generalized_myasthenia_gravis.indication: Adult patients with generalized myasthenia gravis (gMG) who are anti-acetylcholine receptor (AChR) antibody positive

adapt_gmg.key_results: Statistically significant improvement vs placebo; basis for approval

seronegative_mg.status: Decision on approval expected by end of 2026

ocular_mg.significance: First and only development in Ocular MG; +7K addressable patients
ocular_mg.de_risking: ADAPT ocular domain data, real-world case reports

myositis.de_risking: Phase 2 showed significant improvement in muscle strength

itp.de_risking: ADVANCE Phase 3 IV data, real-world Japan data

sjogrens_disease.de_risking: RHO and DAHLIAS Phase 2 proof-of-concept showed reductions in systemic disease activity

commercial_performance.mg_market_impact: VYVGART drove 60% growth in overall MG biologics share
commercial_performance.patient_mix: 70% of MG expansion patients directly from orals (earlier line treatment)

key_considerations: IgG reduction may increase infection risk (monitoring recommended)
safety.note: See full prescribing information for complete safety profile

argenx_differentiation: First mover with most real-world experience
Multiple formulations (IV, SC, PFS, autoinjector coming)
Next-gen FcRn molecules in pipeline (ARGX-213, ARGX-124)

investment_analysis.stage_value: Approved blockbuster with significant expansion potential
investment_analysis.commercial_execution: Excellent - 90% growth, #1 in MG, blockbuster in CIDP

catalysts.significance: First and only Ocular MG development; +7K patients
